name: Dodgecrafts Season 2
description:
Take off with Dodgecrafts Season 2 and boost yourself straight into our new *ESCAPE MODE*

Prepare yourself for Mayhem as you dodge your way through a dreamy gradient bliss!

ESCAPE MODE
No Guns or Turrets

CLASSIC MODE
Original Gameplay

  • Super easy steering will have you zipping around the arena in no time. 
  • Reaction time will be tested! How well can you dodge to avoid enemies and retrieve collectibles to help you achieve the highest score possible.
  • Unlock all 5 crafts! Will you harness the skill to win these!? 
  • Master each craft. Unlock all 5 crafts and harness the skills needed to get the highest scores. 

Original music created specifically for a thrilling experience. Fast paced and fun. Produced by Ruby Francis.
